item.title: Gerrit upgrade
item.description: The original article is available here. Please refer to that for a better reading experience. The Stumbling Blocks Involved with Upgrading Gerrit When a plugin is no longer friendly with a piece of software, the results can range from frustrating to disastrous — especially when the problem happens on a Friday. Gerrit is our tool of choice for code review. It fits our needs, and we believe it gives us advantages other tools can’t.
